channel.title: Tutorials on SPARC FAIR Codeathon

item.title: Quilted Tutorials
item.description: Warning Please make sure you have followed the instruction in the Getting started page before selecting your tutorial. Mapping 2D data points to a 3D organ scaffhold The first Quilted Tutorial consists in mapping 2D data point to a 3D scaffhold. Follow this link to get started and open the SPARC-tutorial.ipynb file. Mapping 2D data points to a 3D organ scaffhold workflow Resampling dataset for simulations
